official_title: To restore until January 1, 1995, the rate of duty on myclobutanil that was in effect under the Tariff Schedules of the United States on December 31, 1988.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 1994, the duty on a-n-butyl-a-(4- chlorophenyl)-1H-1,2,4-triazole-l-propanenitrile (myclobutanil).

titles.title: To restore until January 1, 1995, the rate of duty on myclobutanil that was in effect under the Tariff Schedules of the United States on December 31, 1988.
